vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Pie.getPie (patch_6.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_6.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_6.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_6.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Pie.command (patch_6.sol#25-31):
	-success = adr.call.value(msg.value)(data) patch_6.sol#29
